Preparing the SaltStack Ops System

Prepare the system that will host the SaltStack Ops Enterprise GUI.

The SaltStack Ops can be installed on any system that meets the system requirements. You do not need to install the Salt Minion or Salt Master on this sytem unless you plan to manage the system using Salt.

All required software is installed by the installation package.

Install cherrypy by running the following comand:
sudo pip install cherrypy

Firewall Configuration

SaltStack Ops uses the Salt API to communicate with salt minions. You do not need to open any ports on the SaltStack Ops.
